Privacy Policy

Numa is a public website. With Numa, your user account is for public posting and identification, and contains no valuable private information. We encrypt all password and your password is stored in our secure database.

No, we will never spam you or sell your information.

Yes, we use cookies. This is for Google Analytics statistics, and to save things like your prefered home page view and sorting.

If you delete and close your account, all information and data will be deleted from our server (oh... we only have one) and can not, never ever, be recreated again.

This privacy policy can be changed by us in the future, but I guess that we will not do that.
